attributes.action: legislate to make all executive bonuses and pensions subject to basic ability to pay test on the organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LTDs and PLCs should only ber allowed to pay out bonuses and executive pension top ups from actual profits earned in the specific year of entitlement. No business should be able to pay executives a bonus for failure and no business that is unprofitable should be allowed to pay out to former executives any money that is needed to maintain the business as it moves forward. The interests of the shareholders, suppliers and staff must at least be equal to the interests of the executives.
